revised_title: Experiments on Torsion and Flexure for the Determination of Rigidities in Malleable Iron, Cast Iron, and Copper Rods
tldr: The author conducts experiments on malleable iron, cast iron, and copper rods to determine their torsional and flexural rigidities. The results provide values for Poisson's ratio and other mechanical properties of these materials, contributing to the understanding of their behavior under stress.
